00028 typedef RegistryOf<Parameter*> RegistryOfParameters;

00034 inline void RegisterPointAsParameter(RegistryOfParameters &reg, PointOf<2,Real>& pt){
00035         reg.Register(&pt.X());
00036         reg.Register(&pt.Y());
00037 }
00038 
00042 inline void RegisterPointAsParameter(RegistryOfParameters &reg, PointOf<3,Real>& pt){
00043         reg.Register(&pt.X());
00044         reg.Register(&pt.Y());
00045         reg.Register(&pt.Z());
00046 }

00060                 : Counted()

00064         {}

00086 template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION>
00087 class SourceBaseOf
00088         : public BasicSource
00089 {
00090         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> POINT;
00091 
00092 public:
00093         typedef PRECISION type_precision;
00094         typedef DATA type_data;
00095         static const int type_dimensionality = DIMENSIONALITY;
00096         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> type_point;
00097 
00098         template <class T>
00099         static PRECISION cast_precision(const T&t)  {
00100                 return PRECISION(t);
00101         }
00102 
00103         virtual ~SourceBaseOf() ALWAYS_INLINE
00104         {}
00105 
00107         virtual String DescribeCommon() const
00108         {
00109                 return _INDENT + (
00110                         _LINE + "size: " + this->Size().Describe() + LINE_ 
00111                 );
00112         }
00113 
00116         virtual const POINT& Size() const=0;
00117 
00121         virtual void VirtualGetPoint(DATA& dataOut, const POINT& pt) const =0;
00122 
00126         virtual void VirtualSetPoint(const POINT& pt, const DATA& data)=0;
00127 
00129         virtual POINT Bound(const POINT& pt) const=0;
00130 
00133         virtual void RegisterDataAsParameters(RegistryOfParameters& reg) =0;
00134 
00137         virtual void PrepareForAccess() const
00138         {}
00139 
00141         PRECISION CSize() const
00142         {
00143                 return Size().CVolume();
00144         }
00145 
00148         PRECISION CSize(int n) const
00149         {
00150                 return Size().Dim(n);
00151         }
00152 };

00278 #define SOURCE_ACTUALS_2D                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00279         static const int DIMENSIONALITY=2;                                                                                                                                                                      \
00280         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> type_point;                                                                                           \
00281         typedef DATA type_data;                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00282         typedef PRECISION type_precision;                                                                                                                                                                               \
00283         static const int type_dimensionality=DIMENSIONALITY;                                                                                            \
00284                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00285         inline void GetPoint(DATA& dataOut, const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& pt) const                                       \
00286         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00287                 this->Get(dataOut,pt.X(),pt.Y());                                                                                                                                                                       \
00288         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00289                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00290         inline void VirtualGetPoint(DATA& dataOut, const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& pt) const                \
00291         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00292                 TESTERROR("called VirtualGetPoint");                                                                                                                                            \
00293                 this->Get(dataOut,pt.X(),pt.Y());                                                                                                                                                                       \
00294         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00295                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00296         inline void SetPoint(const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& pt, const DATA& data)                                                  \
00297         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00298                 this->Set(pt.X(),pt.Y(),data);                                                                                                                                                                          \
00299         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \

00303                 TESTERROR("called VirtualSetPoint");                                                                                                                                                            \
